settings.content:
About Register with Donor ID
Register with Donor ID allows your users to register for an account on your website using a donor id you provide them (plus their postal code for security purposes). By allowing your donors to register using a Donor ID you provide, you ensure your donors identity, ensure they are linked to the correct records and reduce the chance duplicate records will be created.

settings.info: Help text that displays above the Donor ID field to help remind your donors where they can find their Donor ID. (OPTIONAL)

settings.content:
About External Donations Display
If you use an external donation/CRM tracker, we can show all donations made through that platform on the logged in member's Orders/Donations page in addition to Givecloud donations. In order to use this feature, the "View Past Donations/Orders" feature must be enabled in the "Donor Portal Features" section of Account Settings. Please note that this feature is only currently set up for DonorPerfect integrations.
